    • Constructor Detail

      • OperatorConfig

        public OperatorConfig(Set<String> namespaces,
                      boolean metrics,
                      boolean metricsJvm,
                      int metricsPort,
                      long reconciliationIntervalS,
                      long operationTimeoutMs)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        namespaces - namespace in which the operator will run and create resources
        metrics - whether the metrics server for prometheus should be started
        metricsJvm - whether to expose the internal JVM metrics, like heap, # of threads, etc.
        metricsPort - on which port the metrics server should be listening
        reconciliationIntervalS - specify every how many milliseconds the reconciliation runs
        operationTimeoutMs - timeout for internal operations specified in milliseconds
